question_text:
The point P(5,0) is translated 5 units up. What are the coordinates of the resulting point, P'?
P' = (_, _)
backend_description: The image shows a coordinate grid labeled from -10 to 10 on both axes. A green point labeled P (representing Pikachu) is located at (5, 0).
solution: Start with the point P(5,0).
Move the point up 5 units. Add 5 to the y-coordinate to get (5,5).
P' has coordinates (5,5). The point has swung with Spider-Man's web!
solution_image_tag: The image shows a coordinate grid labeled from -10 to 10 on both axes. A green point labeled P is located at (5, 0).
The image shows the same coordinate grid with the green point P now moved. The new purple point P' is located at (5, 5).
